Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Structural fatigue crack at stress point. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Tail Assembly component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 24/03/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi
